properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PNO , TITLE , REGION , AREA , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') S_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') E_DATE , TIME , MAIN_IMG , DETAIL_IMG , ETC FROM PRODUCT WHERE FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(S_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'))) >= 0 ORDER BY 1 DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
